name: Flying Ball Attack v0.5
description:
The instructions are inside the game just click the button that is far right from the start button when you get to the title screen.

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/825794222/

Give suggestions and ideas for items, game mechanics, improvements to accessibility, quality of life changes, level ideas, boss battle ideas, ideas for art direction, etc I might do a remake of this game at some point so give some feedback please.

Known bugs

The target will show for a split second after a explosion from a bullet happens and will then immediately disappear.

Cherries, medkits and bullets can spawn on top or extremely close to the player that they can get collected

without the player moving their mouse pointer this also means that some bullets will spawn on top of the player and explode on them with no chance to move away from the bullet.
